description: The Department of Transport Canada, through the Aircraft Services Directorate (ASD) (the End User) has a requirement for electronic Flight Management System (FMS) database services.
full_summary:
**Service Announcement: Flight Management System (FMS) Database Subscription Services**

**Contract Title:** [None] [ None]

**Government Agency:** Transport Canada

**Contract Reference Number:** [cb-6630-76863747]

**Publication Date:** June 22, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 7, 2023, 2 PM (ET)

**Amendment Notice:** This is amendment number 1 to the original tender.

**Background:** Transport Canada, through the Aircraft Services Directorate (ASD), requires electronic Flight Management System (FMS) database services on an as-and-when-required basis. The services involve uninterrupted access to the supplier's FMS database items.

**Requirements:**

* The supplier must be the production certificate holder and current parts and support products manufacturer for the FMS in use on the ASD's fleet and flight simulator.
* The supplier must provide the latest navigation information to the ASD.

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Revised World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and other trade agreements.

**Pre-Identified Supplier:** Universal Avionics has been pre-identified for this procurement. However, other suppliers may still submit a statement of capabilities to bid on the contract.

**Contract Period and Cost:** The proposed contract is for a period of three (3) years, with options for two (2) additional one-year periods. The estimated value of the contract, including options, is USD $360,000.00 (HST extra).

**Statement of Capabilities:** Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described in the notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to Dominik Giroux, Aircraft Services Directorate, by July 6, 2023, at 2 PM (ET).

Contact:
Dominik Giroux, Aircraft Services Directorate, (343) 576-9931, dominik.giroux@tc.gc.ca. [END]
